meanings.definition: Representing an abstract concept in a concrete form.
meanings.sent1: The artist's instantiating painting brought life to the museum.
meanings.sent2: The instantiating sculpture beautifully captured the essence of nature.
meanings.sent3: The instantiating design of the building made it look like a real-life fairy tale castle.
meanings.sent4: Her instantiating imagination turned the dull room into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The instantiating colors on the canvas made the artwork truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Creating an instance or example of a class or object.
meanings.sent1: She was instantiating a new character in her story.
meanings.sent2: The programmer was instantiating a new object in the code.
meanings.sent3: Instantiating a new recipe, she accidentally added too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The chef was instantiating a masterpiece dish for the competition.
meanings.sent5: Instantiating a new friendship, they shared a special bond from the start.
